Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie "Photographer"
Reviews.Content: So Im a professional photographer, at my studio we use a nikon, But I recently wanted to start branching out on my own, so I wanted to buy my first dslr. :)After much thought and deliberation I decided on the T3! Its a wonderful camera, and is more then enough for me, and the family, senior, weddings etc Ive been doing!This kit was the perfect price, I couldnt have found a better deal! I love everything in this kit. except 1 thing, its a minor thing cause it doesnt really affect me, but the Tri-Pod is Very Flimsy and when I went to put my camera on it, the tri-pod was broken, even if it wasnt broken I wouldnt trust putting my camera on there. Luckily I have a better durable tri-pod! :) Like I said nothing that affects me :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and kit!
Reviews.Author: linetta33 "Linetta33"
Reviews.Content: I did my research and shopped around.  I looked at flyers and asked what other people thought of Canon.  For what is offered, it is the best price I could find.  Know the slight differences in Canon EOS Rebel T3 and T3i though.  T3i is slightly more expensive related to higher MP (18), a swivel screen, a sensor telling you when to clean your lense and other differences.  I have the T3 and am extremely content with it.  GREAT pictures and easy to use...I would recommend reading the book and experimenting.  It then becomes easier still.

Reviews.Title: T3 Package Review
Reviews.Author: Max Gatsche
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my son and his wife for their wedding present.  After seeing it I bought one for my wife.  Everyone loves them.Camera is great, takes great pictures and has plenty of options that will help any photographer.  75-300mm lens is a pretty good starter zoom.  16GB SD card is plenty of memory for most people.  Camera bag is not a bad starter bag.  Tripod has a lot to be desired and is flimsy.  I would recommend you get another one if you plan on serious tripod usage.All in all, this is a great camera that you can grow with, at a great priceLastly the vendor sent the package right away without a hitch.I would highly recommend this package.

Reviews.Title: Great Features
Reviews.Author: BG
Reviews.Content: I took my time to review many DSLR cameras before making my choice with this EOS Rebel T3 camera by Canon.I would say this is above a beginner who is just starting out with an DSLR camera. I took 6 to 8 hours reading the manualand watch the DVD. No more auto mode for me. In the Program mode you can change settings on the fly and still havemany auto features retained. I plan to use this camera for closeups, portraits, and macro shots. I am the type of person who study's everything there is to know about a product before using it. I have taken some fantastic shots just playing with the various settings that this camera has to offer.  I am solidly convinced this is the camera for anyone who wants to go beyond Auto and get the enjoyment out this camera using the various settings in the program mode. WOW factor off the charts. Glad I read reviews first before making my final choice. The only negative would be that both of the lenses that came with this purchase are not UMC, but it is livable.Update:I have had this camera now for about three days and have played around with various settings and features. Definitely will keep in P mode for majority of the shots. After watching the instruction DVD that came with the camera, I was able to understand more and more why you should use the P mode, There you can access setting and features and make changes on the fly. Auto mode is not what I purchased this camera for. I knew that when I decided to buy this camera. I watched the DVD twice and with my camera next to me. I was able to follow along with the narrator and made same changes to took practice shots.

Reviews.Title: Excellent package - camera, lenses and more - great value!
Reviews.Author: Elinor Johnson
Reviews.Content: A number of years ago when my husband and I had no kids and more disposable income we were both rather into slr photography, various film speeds, slides, black & white, effects filters etc.  We had a lot of fun with it but spent a lot of money on film and processing.As digital cameras took over the market we were still holding out for a reasonably prices Digital SLR (now that the majority of our "disposable income" was taken up feeding and housing our growing family).  As last year's Consumer Reports year book rated the Canon Rebel T3, T3i and T4 very similar in quality, price and value I figured it was time for the best birthday present ever for my husband.  Bonus was the lens mount on the T3 would take his old lenses from his traditional Rebel SLR.This kit was by far the best value for the camera, multiple lenses, bag, extra battery, tri-pod, cables and much more.  Over the past 7 months he has taken thousands of photographs (3 kids in 5 different sports - and throw in ballet & tap for good measure) and the photos keep getting better as he gains further skill with the camera.  Fast shutter speed, easy swap out of lenses, ability to set ISO and depth of field make it a wonderful choice.He got it for his birthday in December 2012 and as recently as last week commented "did I thank you for this camera, I really love this camera, thanks again".Highly recommend - but as others have said the tri-pod is flimsy and not really an asset to the package deal.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, poor chinesse accesories.
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Camera is acceptable, but you might find same accesories cheaper somewhere else. Besides, the Zoom Lens has no image stabilizer which makes a lot harder to take zoom photos.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I like the product a lot, but I did not receive all the items that are shown in with the entire kit and the bag I got was real thin and cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: perfect upgrade
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: We have been shopping for our first dslr camera for a while.  This package deal couldn't be beat.  We love it!

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Medicman
Reviews.Content: Great Camera and package.. The Pictures it takes are awesome in quality.. Very easy to learn and use!!! Instructions are easy to follow.. Highly recommend !

Reviews.Title: Good camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Xavier Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Good product, arrived on time.  The camera works fine and the rest of the items works fine too. It doesnt came with the 16G SDHC

Reviews.Title: Camera Purchase
Reviews.Author: Jim Bolling
Reviews.Content: I stopped working one week after purchase.  Make sure you save every package that it comes with.  You need EVERTHING in order to have it accepted when you send it back.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from canon
Reviews.Author: James R. Mollere
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my wife. It worked fine the first 3 times we used it, then for one reason or another the camera would not recognize the SD card. At the same time I noticed the battery failed to hold a charge and completely drained a freshly charged battery overnight.  I contacted beach camera, and they sent me a new SD card.  This card worked fine, but the battery still failed to hold its charge.  Beach referred me to Canon warranty repair, as it was now 45 days past purchase date (even though it sat under the Christmas tree for 23 days).I sent the camera to Canon, with a note detailing the SD card problem which had been resolved, and the problem the batteries failing to hold a charge, which I thought might be related.  They returned the camera, stating that they had replaced an electrical part related to the SD card....and made no mention of the battery problem.  I returned the camera to Canon, asking them to check for problems related to the rapid battery drain.  I just received the camera, with a note advising me that they were unable to duplicate my problem, and the camera worked per their specifications.I bought this camera on the advice of two close family members that owned it, and highly recommended it. In mentioning my problem to them, they both stated that they battery remained charged for over a week as they took occasional pictures....as mine did for the first 3 weeks we owned it.So, while the Rebel T3 is a quality camera, don't depend on Canon to resolve your problem if you get a lemon.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Value!
Reviews.Author: rmatraining "rmatraining"
Reviews.Content: I would have given a five rating except for a few things I will mention, but overall it is an excellent value.The picture sharpness on the 18-55 mm lens is excellent, and that is one of the main reasons I wanted to upgrade from a Canon point and shoot.  The second lens that comes with it (70-300 mm) is virtually useless without image stabilization unless you set up a tripod.  Speaking of tripods, the one you get with the kit is too lightweight to steady the 70-300 mm lens for a quality shot, so plan on buying a heavy-duty tripod if you want to use the lens.The camera on Auto takes great indoor pictures with flash, far better than anything I have owned in the past.  I have not been able to get a good picture with a subject under an incandescent bulb, and I have tried about all the settings I can find, but maybe I have yet to learn the secret.  Yes, I have put the camera on the incandescent setting.When you price the kit out separately, the extra you spend on the kit vs buying the camera separately is a phenomenal deal.  I cannot justify replacing the 70-300 lens with the image stabilizing equivalent ($699), but I will probably buy something in the 200 mm range that is stabilized.If you want to step up to a DSLR quality camera, you can't go wrong with this kit.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - Bad Tripod - bad spare battery
Reviews.Author: Div
Reviews.Content: Pros - Good camera.Cons -Bad Tripod. Weak flimsy, upward holding screw of the base broke off. If you use tripod, you will loose the camera. Tripod is good for smaller cameras.Extra focus battery - the additional battery if not of Canon its of Focus and has much weaker strength and discharges quickly.Suggestion, avoid clutter in your house, buy a camera and 2 lens bundle elsewhere and a good tripod. you wont need the other bundle that is given.Also, most of things shown, you will get in original camera packing.

Reviews.Title: Open Your Eyes!
Reviews.Author: S. Normand "Scotcher"
Reviews.Content: It is easy to get tunnel vision with all these glowing reviews on Amazon.  However, this camera really doesn't have any standout features.  Its the same old technology that has been around for years.  You are still going to have to wait a ton of time between shots, the burst mode is slow, and the burst mode does not support focusing between shots.  The view finder is not going to actually show you the picture you are going to get since it is an optical viewfinder.  And the viewfinder is going to black out when you actually take the shot.  Sure, all these traditional SLR cameras take great pictures, but really, what camera at this price doesn't.  What are you really looking for at this price point?  For me, it is fast between shots and can burst fast so I am sure to get a great shot.  I hate cameras that make me wait between shots until the camera is ready to take another picture.If you want the hidden gem in the SLR camera world, check out the Sony SLT technology.  It is a new technology that is much faster and allows the viewfinder and focus mechanisms to function like they should.  I have the SLT-A57 and I think you can tell from the reviews that it is as good or better than any of these SLR cameras.No, I don't work for Sony.  I just think that someone should point out the fact that there are other options out there and better technology available.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: I bought this camara to take quality pictures at the boat races.  It is light weight and easy to use.  The price was right, the only thing I thought should have been included was a camara strap.

Reviews.Title: THIS CAMERA IS AWESOME!!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome, the kit has everything you need to take grate pictures. I did not find anything better or cheaper in the matket. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Skittles
Reviews.Content: Bought this bundle and was surprised with all of the extras that I received. This same camera without all of the accessories was on sale for about this price. Was a great deal when I scooped it up and I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 digital SLR
Reviews.Author: David Woodworth
Reviews.Content: Fantastic deal and equipment, dream come true, love it! The capability of getting shots the way I really want is so important, and the quality of the equipment is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera in the World
Reviews.Author: Linda Morris
Reviews.Content: The Cannon EOS T3 Rebel is the best camera in the world. This package deal included everything we needed and many convenience items we hadn't thought of prior to making this purchase. The extra battery came in handy for a trip to Europe. Great price and great deal!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3  is totally  FANTASTIC!!!!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Fotheringham "V. Fotheringham"
Reviews.Content: This is one FANTASTIC camera!!!!  I regret not getting one much earlier!  And the package deal, can't be beat!  I couldn't be happier with a camera!  I was able to get photos of our cousins performance and they can no longer hide in the shadows!  It get's clear shots in very low light!

Reviews.Title: Don't know why I waited so long to buy a camera like this.
Reviews.Author: Dudley
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I waited so long to buy a camera like this - got it at Christmas and i have more pictures of 2013 than of just about any year before - so easy to use and takes tremendous pictures - easy to download to the computer and share -

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Christina Whitney
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter because she is a part of her school yearbook committee.  This camera takes great shots.  We are still learning all of its capabilities but so far we are very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Lovely piece of camera
Reviews.Author: Vikki
Reviews.Content: This cam gives great shots and I'm loving it more everyday... Bought the deal package with the extra lens, bag, tripod, etc

Reviews.Title: Love it but still learning it
Reviews.Author: Colin Holligan
Reviews.Content: I have always had a digital camera and I tend to lean towards canon with this being my third one. Still to early to give a totally honest feedback but I am loving it so far.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: As I was expected good bargain, all the items are perfectly in a good condition. So I recommend it. Five stars fro me.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Piece of Kit
Reviews.Author: Mitesh Patel
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera & Extra's and Well Worth The Money.Would Recommend To Other People without thinking twice.The Dogs Bollocks Basically :))

Reviews.Title: oldskoool 77
Reviews.Author: oldskool 77
Reviews.Content: Camera met all expectations for a package deal at a great price.  Did not go wrong with this purchase.  Would recommend this camera to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Ernest W. Lautsch "E. Lautsch"
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  I think I like it better than my Nikon N80 that was stolen.  I would recommend this camera to a friend!

Reviews.Title: Great camera value!
Reviews.Author: ROBERT M. FORNOS
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price and great bundle package.  Takes good pictures in any light any place any time.  Good all around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: this was the perfect SLR camera for us. the package had everything needed to use it right away, the pics look great

Reviews.Title: Everything and more!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased to see everything in the box when I opened it. High quality camera and accessories for the $$$. This package has everything you need. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: The camera was just what I wanted. The add-ons were perfect and the extra lens allowed for some neat shots. The cameras easy to use and great for beginners.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.  Bad case.
Reviews.Author: John Sibilia
Reviews.Content: Camera, lens and hardware were fine.  I was disappointed in the case.  It was low quality material but more than that it was damaged (knife cut on the top panel) before delivery.  Since this was a x-mas present I didn't have time to return everything.  I had to go and buy a better case for $65.

Reviews.Title: Savings????
Reviews.Author: john paysinger
Reviews.Content: The camera and lens are great-  Ive always had Canon products, but the rest of the stuff, from Zeikos, in the "bundle" or "package" is nothing but junk!! The bag dosnt have a zipper to keep your stuff clean, the tri-pod is really junky, and the card reader dosent even work!  Thats what you get for trying to save a buck!

Reviews.Title: The Rebel:
Reviews.Author: J. S. Vargo
Reviews.Content: I was afraid to purchase this camera .  after reading some of the reviews (  good and bad ) the  camera sounded great,not to sure about  the  Acc Pack  the Tri-pod is junk plastic very flimsy  ... The Carry Bag just like the other reviews the clips broke  the first time we opened it.. also ordered an extra battery  ( even called to be sure of the correct one )( Voila  ) the wrong battery....The only other problem i  have is when the shutter Slams-and i mean Slams open and closed it sounds like you are racking a 3 Inch 12 Gauge shell in the chamber...It's Loud ....any way 3 stars is iffy .......................

Reviews.Title: Beware of Ace Photo
Reviews.Author: Joe's amazon
Reviews.Content: The Camera is excellent. This bundle is a good value but includes a few things really not needed. I do not recommend Ace camera. I purchased this package last year for a gift. The UPS box arrived in tact but the boxes inside packed by Ace were smashed. The camera worked but presentation of a gift was terrible and it is clear Ace employees do not handle the electronics carefully. I love Amazon, but If you order this bundle, use a different vendor.

Reviews.Title: 75 - 300mm Canon lens
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: The camera and 18-55mm lens probably exceeded my expectations, but the 75-300mm did not.  I expected to get more amgnification from the 300mm end of the lens.  I've not experienced any of the difficulties in stabilizing subjects at a distance without a tripod referred to in other reviews.  I'm still learning the digital SLR capabilities vs the older digital camera.  So my opinion may change when I'm better qualified to use the lens.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME AMAZON SELLER!
Reviews.Author: saint harley
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Black Friday. The seller gave me a great deal and I just love this camera and all the goodies that came with it. I am a beginner at dslr but the seller sent along with the camera a starter video which helped me tremendously. I am the happiest camper on the face of this earth. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!! Best deal ever!!!

Reviews.Title: great... but
Reviews.Author: Cornel  A Leahu
Reviews.Content: The quality of the images is great and its easy to use...but1) the tripod was busted.. real cheap construction2) The CANON software for downloading works but is very glitchy and I get errors every time I plug in the camera.. even after unloading and reloading the whole process. A simpler interface would have been much better.. I can download after I close the software and start again, but never on the first try.3) I cannot get the card reader to work at all. I see that this problem is common on-line.4) Would it cost that much more not to make the camera out of plastic?

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
Reviews.Author: anonomys
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a great camera for an upcoming trip to Costa Rica.  I sent out a message to friends and family asking for suggestions.  Out of 30 something responses, all but 3 people suggested this camera.  I couldn't be happier!!!  I had absolutely no idea how to use it, what settings to put it on, etc.  I constantly ran into people on the trip and at sporting events with my kids that had the same camera.  Everyone kept saying to just keep playing with it and read the manual.  This has FAR exceeded my expectations for the price.  I got everything I could possibly need, plus more, with this bundle pack.  It works well, takes great pictures, easy to use.....I'm sold!!!  I would recommend this camera to anyone!  I had NO experience at all and feel like in just a few weeks I've learned so much.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: venkat
Reviews.Content: Overall the item is good, but the quality of SLR Camera Gadget bag is bad.The clips were broken when it was assembling.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Bullet
Reviews.Content: This might look cheap, but take heed, the items that come along with it are worth $1, so really if you think about it, it's not a steal or a deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 bundle is fantastic
Reviews.Author: Heath Adler
Reviews.Content: The camera (5 stars) is fantastic as well as the lenses.The cleaning kit and accessories are all right, except for the tripod. The tripod is extremely cheap and flimsy and I would not advise using it without being within arms reach in case it topples over should a fly land on it. Must say the camera was what I was looking for with the extra battery and lenses. The rest of the items bundled with it are as expected with the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Cheap stand breaks easy
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Everythinngs good but the stand. Mine broke the day I got it. A friend has the same package and same thing happen to her. Cheap stand.

Reviews.Title: Great value, great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Mark Howard
Reviews.Content: I purchased the T3 bundle to take pictures of our children, and it doesn't disappoint!  Great photos with only a point and shoot.  I had the camera out of the package and shooting in about 5 minutes.  The telephoto lens works great, and I would recommend this bundle to anyone looking for a good starter camera.  I would also recommend going for the T3i bundle, the differences between the two are the megapixels (which isn't that important unless you are enlarging or cropping pictures), and the image processor.  The difference (today) is only about $45 bucks.  Thought about returning the one I ordered, but after seeing the pictures on a 47-inch HD TV, didn't think it was worth it as we would have to pay $14 for the return as the item was not defective.The only con is that the HDMI cable sent with the camera was HDMI micro, and the camera requires an HDMI mini cable, but they are quite cheap, and I can always use another HDMI micro cable.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: Scott M. Collier
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these kits for my students to use for our school yearbook. The cameras are super reliable and all of the items that came with it are AMAZING for the price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: D. Ree
Reviews.Content: I've been searching for a fairly simple DSLR camera for a while and I finally found it.What really sold me was the fact that I get all of the items I will ever use in one package.So far it has done great and the pictures are better than I expected.The service from the seller was great and I actually got it faster than I thought I would.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: monica Hopper
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to anyone! this is a great deal with a great price tag. only bad thing was the Camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: firewind
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, and the accessories and extra lens make this set a pretty unbeatable deal. Quick shipping, too!

Reviews.Title: Amazing product and increidble bundle
Reviews.Author: slinktalk
Reviews.Content: Just love this camera, I bought this as a gift and everything came in mint condition, the camera has an amazing picture quality. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: Kindle User "CGP"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera and it came with great extras that are very nice. The camera takes great pictures and is an easy camera to use. Love it!  We did however have a broken tripod, but we were immediately taken care of and a replacement is on the way.

Reviews.Title: Bought it to begin
Reviews.Author: UT
Reviews.Content: I bought the bundle to beging my incursion in photography. It is an EXCELENT bundle...it has all you need to start playing with the camera and more. The only thing I recommend not to use is the SD card adapter, as it has some issues. The rest of the items are excelent!

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with a Canon!
Reviews.Author: Coreen G Fortune Culp
Reviews.Content: We have ordered Canon cameras for quite some time now so when it came time to order a new one, we went straight to Canon again. A friend has this same camera so I've had a chance to use it. Very simple! With two lenses and all the accessories, you can't beat the price. We look for quality and reliability at a great price and we got it! The picture is so crisp! When we need another camera, we'll definitely go with another Canon. However, I don't expect we'll need one for a very long time!

Reviews.Title: In love!!
Reviews.Author: allan templeton
Reviews.Content: I am over the moon with the camera...the shutter speed is great with a fast moving kid that plays baseball!

Reviews.Title: Given as a gift, receiver loves it
Reviews.Author: Morgan
Reviews.Content: Gave as a birthday gift to someone that needed a whole setup.  So far she is thrilled and is producing great photos with the camera.  Items arrived on the day promised and I haven't heard anything about the kit that is negative.  Then again, it's a pretty sweet gift and I probably wouldn't complain about anything in it either.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Cerevita
Reviews.Content: Great deal. All camera parts are original Cannon and the accessories are best quality. I was worriedthe tripod or cables would be cheap but everthing was great.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Mpitts "highlander"
Reviews.Content: i was told that this was a great camera by someone who takes a lot of pictures of her children and others.  I have always wanted a nice camera.  i have not learned all the ins and outs yet but so far i have made some really good pictures.  This is a great package for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Very good for beginners
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for myself as a graduation gift and it is very good for a first  camera. It's very easy to figure out and I am very happy with the two lenses it comes with. The case will fit the camera and one lens so it's on the smaller side. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Graves
Reviews.Content: Can't wait to learn more about it but auto works great for right now. The big lens is working great for graduation photos. You can actually tell who the people are even though you had a bad seat.

Reviews.Title: Auto focus issues
Reviews.Author: Ralph A Lampe
Reviews.Content: After the initial setup and taking a couple of pictures the auto focus isn't functioning properly.  It is my understanding that when I push the focus button half-way down the LCD monitor should be on and it should auto focus.  This is not happening.  I am very disappointed in this issue because I don't always want to use the view finder and would prefer to use the LCD screen.

Reviews.Title: excellent package. good seller
Reviews.Author: Gary Brackenridge
Reviews.Content: Well done to these guys! as described. no issues with packaging or quality of components. no surprises. excellent transaction. should be a serious consideration for those entering the DSLR space.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Sandra Young
Reviews.Content: As promised in the ad, a lot of bonus stuff for the price. Camera is taking great pics as well.

Reviews.Title: I agree with everyone else here,
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Austin "Don't tell God how big the ...
Reviews.Content: the camera is awesome but the accessories suck. The tri-pod is flimsy,but the package includes everything needed for basic use.

Reviews.Title: What a bargain!
Reviews.Author: mnl dpm
Reviews.Content: For this price, I expected all the accessories to be junk.  What I found was all the included products to be of a good quality.  The extra lens is even a real Canon lens.  The gadget bag is a little cheap, but everything else is better quality than expected.  I am very satisfied with this purchase and would use this seller again.

Reviews.Title: I don't know why people are complaining?!
Reviews.Author: Chelsey
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, it's my first DSLR and the DVD it comes with is very helpful. There is a lot of beginner pointers and it answers common questions about how to take common shots. All the odds and ends thing the camera comes with is definitely a bonus, but of course it's not top of the line stuff. I mean, you're paying for the price of the camera and second lens- and getting an entire surplus of goodies for what, 50-100 dollars more then the actually camera?? I'll take it. The tripod isn't the greatest thing, not like it ever claimed to be, but it works, and the battery life is so good!

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: kathi chokenea-baxla
Reviews.Content: entry level slr camera kit... what a great deal for the price. you get everything needed to get a starter going with slr digital photography

Reviews.Title: Great pictures in full auto mode
Reviews.Author: Lamar Cole
Reviews.Content: This bundle is just what we wanted, and then some..We looked at a lot of options for a quality camera and are very happy with our selection.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and accessories for my husband as a belated Christmas present.  We have used this for fabulous pictures of; our new baby, softball games, prom and day to day pictures.  The additional lens, tripod, extra battery etc give you everything you need to capture all the special moments in life.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: Great camera it has everything i was looking for! I must say that its my first DSLR camera, great for learning and it has all the configurations i was looking for i totally recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: The camera and accessories were all there in time.
Reviews.Author: stacy w
Reviews.Content: The camera and assecories made it on time as all the parts were in the box. Everything works great and still is. I am very happy with it and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: A great bundle deal for a wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley Maier
Reviews.Content: I truly love the great deal I got for this wonderful Canon camera. The company also included an instruction guide which helped me learn how to use this camera. The camera is awesome and the digital technology has improved from former years. I can't state enough good things about it and look forward to many years of enjoying it. For example, I took a photo of a strawberry and without knowing all that much about settings (okay.......I didn't know what I was doing), the photo came out quite sharp and one could notice the surface of the strawberry very clearly. This camera is great for beginners

Reviews.Title: Perfection!
Reviews.Author: Nelly
Reviews.Content: We purchased the t3i for our oldest daughter when she graduated high school. We're extremely impressed with it and our next graduate requested this t3 for her graduation gift. The first time she got to use it was on Tybee Island in GA where she captured birds in flight, dolphins off the shore as well as many smaller objects like flowers. Anyone who has an interest in photography will enjoy this camera. We even plan to do her senior pictures ourselves with it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Shimon R.
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with it. Arrived ok and as expected. Great product good pictures good accessories at very good price.Nothing bad to say. Recommended !!!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Carl Nagle
Reviews.Content: Very comprehensive kit for, great manual features, the lenses are great and the trip has a very control features. Great value

Reviews.Title: excelent product
Reviews.Author: Mariangelica
Reviews.Content: The canon EOS Rebel was a surprised form muy husband's birthday,  so he is very exciting with his new camera, the CD was helpful and he spend a hour just to learn how te camera works

Reviews.Title: Good combination
Reviews.Author: 2shots
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the package purchase even though I found it for $150 cheaper three days later.  The only thing that really wasn't what I expected was the tripod.  It seems a little flimsy.  Other than that, all is well. Twoshots

Reviews.Title: delivered as ordered
Reviews.Author: John P. Fahy
Reviews.Content: Camera was delivered as ordered - Good bundle deal - Bought as a gift for my daughter she is extremly happy so far -  She is heading to Europe once school is out to give it a try!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price!
Reviews.Author: Mary Lou Hines
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted something better than your standard point & shoot camera to take on my very first cruise ever to the Caribbean.  I am an old Canon lover from way back as I have and old film SLR that I have not used in a while.  I read a lot of reviews about this camera before purchasing and looked at a lot of different cameras before settling on this one.  It is first of all a great price for what you get.  It is very easy to take out of the box and use and the more you play the more you learn or in my case the more my memory comes back while shooting manually.  I have been playing with this for a few weeks now and the pictures are wonderful and hope to capture some beautiful memories on vacation.I seem to get everything that they said was in the package. I have not opened and used the tri-pod yet but if it is as weak as people reviewed it will probably stay i the box and I can use the one I have already.For anyone looking for a great inexpensive camera this is a good starting point. Love it~

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Heather R. Souders
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quick shopping and the product itself, so far! I don't have all the functions and "ins and outs" of the camera memorized yet, but I'm sure that will come with time. So far, it has taken great pictures. I'll be in church this Sunday so I'm interested to see how church pictures turn out.

Reviews.Title: I like the product
Reviews.Author: Julie Karas
Reviews.Content: I think it is worth the money. I like the telephoto lense.prompt shipping.  great pictures of my son playing baseball.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Moises Bravo
Reviews.Content: love it, is the perfect combo package and excellent price.very convenient for an apprentices.good deal.thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA AND LENSE!
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle for the camera nd extra lense and that's why I rated it a 5 star.the rest of the stuff was a bonus. I don't use the memory card - I purchased a wireless eye-fi card and use that and LOVE IT!I did expect to use the extra battery included in the bundle....BUT it's not even compatible and therefore worthless.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: My father is happy with his gift he just started photography classes and he is very please with it. Awesome deal

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!
Reviews.Author: Toy W.
Reviews.Content: I love Canon products. I love to take pictures and this camera does everything. The fact that it came in a bundle is even better. The stores only bundle the camera and lens, but Amazon offers the bundle with everything you need. LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: I received my packaged ahead of schedule and was delighted to see all of the different products inside. The camera and the lenses work beautifully. My photographs are turning out wonderful and the quality is amazing. Would suggest this product to anyone looking.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jacky
Reviews.Content: We watched the enclosed DVD on how to use this camera.  It was a big help.  We have already been taking many pictures with our new camera and are very pleased with this product and would recommend it to everyone looking for a super zoom digital camera for amateurs.  It was recommended to us by our daughter.  the prize was very reasonable compared to store prizes and other online web sights.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my camera! My husband bought this for me and I use it all the time, takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: The camera and lenses are great
Reviews.Author: T. Silveira "My oppinion"
Reviews.Content: The accessories are mostly great too, but one of the cords was unnecessary (it was already in the cameral box), and the tripod is really cheap.  I already had a nice tripod and would never be comfortable putting the camera on the plastic one that came with it.  It is light weight, but I wouldn't trust it.  The case is nice, but appears to be constructed of light duty material on the inside.  I have other cases that are better made.  The kit did come with everything that you would want to have available.  The second battery and SD card are items that I always pick up!  The second lens is going to take a little getting used to, but I probably won't have a lot of use for it.  I think this may be overkill for most people with the extra lens, but for the price, I couldn't resist trying it.!

Reviews.Title: What a great deal!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I seriously have everything I need with this package to start teaching myself photography. Everything came as promised on time.

Reviews.Title: awesome package
Reviews.Author: thomas hardesty
Reviews.Content: this arrived fast and in mint condition, awesome package deal, no hassle and product is great.  love my new camera, would buy another one if something happened to this one.  saved a lot of money on package deal as well thankyou

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: marcia c. "marcia l crum"
Reviews.Content: The camera works very well, I was only buying it to replace the camera that was stolen while we were on vacation.  The bag is too small, & the tripod is a little flimsy, but overall it is a very good value.

Reviews.Title: OMG My first GOOD Camera
Reviews.Author: dbetrand
Reviews.Content: I am so in love with my Cannon.  It is so easy to use and I have done some pretty good pictures.  The grouping was an excellent way for a beginner to get acquainted with everything. I love that it came with a telephoto.  This is a GREAT first camera.  Very easy to use.  One suggestion.  I know it has a flash, but I had to buy a separate removable flash, maybe you can incorporate into bundle.  That would save time and money.  Otherwise GREAT product

Reviews.Title: amazing deal
Reviews.Author: ***Andy***
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing deal  for an amazing camera. This is a great kit for the beginning photographer.  The tripod is kinda cheep and flimsy i would recommend getting a better one but everything else is good!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Service
Reviews.Author: Jeanne M. Boxley
Reviews.Content: The package arrived with a cracked Focus Full Sized 59 Photo Video Tripod. Erin F., of Focus Camera was helpful, friendly and offered the best customer service I've received in ages. No questions asked, the new tripod was delivered in days in perfect condition.It would be my absolute pleasure to do business with Focus Camera in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Chrissy Sloan
Reviews.Content: I. Love. This. Camera! I bought this camera to start taking nice pictures of my daughter to get developed to hang on our walls. I love everything about this camera! :) It was definitely great for a first time camera. I recommend the camera and this package as well.

Reviews.Title: Quality products
Reviews.Author: Andrea Aguilar
Reviews.Content: The best price available online for such quality products. Everything was wrapped exceptionally well, so there was no need to worry about any scratches on the products. The camera was a gift for someone else, but definitely plan on purchasing one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn Sprayberry
Reviews.Content: I have thoroughly enjoyed my new camera and all of its accessories. I have taken over 3000 pics so far and they are great.

Reviews.Title: nice outfit
Reviews.Author: patrick allen
Reviews.Content: all you need to begin taking quality photos.well put together package.priced so even on a modest budget you can produce professional grade photo's.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Tori
Reviews.Content: Everything was as advertised and am very happy with my purchase. My husband has been very excited to start using his new camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic value
Reviews.Author: D. Machata "machata"
Reviews.Content: This is is a wonderful bundle. You get everything you need to get started in serious amateur photography. My wife uses it to photograph her ETSY products, and it has been perfect for that. She raves about it. I finally got the right gift!

Reviews.Title: great camera, great price for everything you need!
Reviews.Author: M. Killion
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera. You can do everything from set it up like an expert to just point and shoot. This bundle came witheverything I needed to get started taking pictures, even an extra battery, which is very important when you go out on a trip,or you just forgot to check the battery.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: sosy  dunsmore
Reviews.Content: Am so happy with my decision  to buy this, and am glad!  it is everything it said it was. best choice made and I thank you! will tell all my friends to buy from you. I would rate it a ten if you had ten stars. I LOOK FORWARD TO BUYING FROM YOU IN THE FUTURE.

Reviews.Title: love the camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Mathison
Reviews.Content: Takes a lot better pictures then my other camera. I have three sons that are inSports, so the zoom works great.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: January
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera, and I could not be happier! The camera is great and the items in the kit just added to loving this product. So happy I made the decision to purchase this  -could not beat the price for all that came with it.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Elaine H. Strong
Reviews.Content: I liked the price  and the weight of the Canon.  I  have taken lots of beautiful snow pictures during this winter  and will look back at them during the summer and  let them cool me  down.

Reviews.Title: Loveeeeeeeee great deal
Reviews.Author: India
Reviews.Content: Came with everything I needed and more for a great price. Other vendors charged twice as much for less so it's worth every penny

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: JERRY BARKER
Reviews.Content: IT WAS FOR MY GRAND DAUGHTER AND SHE IS TOTALY IN LOVE WITH IT.LOOKING.. FORWARDTO USING IT FOR COLLAGE COURSE

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Luis Antonio
Reviews.Content: I bought it because of a trip I did it and worked out really good! You need to be careful with the tripode, it is a lit of bit delicate.

Reviews.Title: my new camera
Reviews.Author: BILL CHOPP
Reviews.Content: I am still learning about my new camera, but it is exactly what I was looking for and works perfectly. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Cole
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my beginning photo class. It's perfect, I like the accessories other than the tri-pod which is kind of low quality. I don't think the bag is as bad as some other reviewers. It fits the camera and both lenses, plus the extra battery and card reader.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, especially easy to master
Reviews.Author: Martha Holt
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital SLR, I am excited to learn.  This was also my first "bundle", WOW! all of the items in the bundle met my expectations.  I had read some negative comments related to the tripod.  This tripod is light weight, but for the price, it definitelywhat I expected.  I would rather have a less expensive tripod and a great lens.

Reviews.Title: Get it! No regrets!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This is really the best camera, it came with everything and even had an extra lens. I've taken some of my best shots with this camera and I have no regrets getting it. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!!!
Reviews.Author: ZombieBuster "Zulu"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic kit, well worth the price.  I use it once in a while but my daughter is the main photo nut in the house - just in time for a grand-kid to be born, she uses it like a pro yet she is truly a beginner - that's how easy to use this camera is - BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: great decision
Reviews.Author: Ugochi Alams
Reviews.Content: Great camera and accessories! Dvd tutorial was also very informative. I'm really glad I bought it, takes good pictures all the time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera! Different bag
Reviews.Author: Michelle Rowland
Reviews.Content: Love the camera....easy to use for a novice. Backpack style bag or sling bag would make carrying it around more convenient

Reviews.Title: superior quality camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: Linda-Diann Wortham
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I treated myself for Christmas. I bought myself a new camera and so glad that I decided on this product. I highly recommend everyone that is a hobbyist or professional photographer to buy this product.  Everything is included but filters. I would recommend buying the filter package too, to protect your valuable lenses.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Cedric McFadden
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera and takes great pictures. Excellent price for the amount of things you get in this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: Shawn Walker
Reviews.Content: Everything showed up in working order and without defect. The carrying case that came with it was very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera cheap tripod..
Reviews.Author: Melissa Wilms
Reviews.Content: Great camera... Just wish the tripod wasn't so cheap.. Who wants to put a nice camera on a tripod and not feel safe enough to walk away from it..

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: William L Bowie Jr
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife as a Christmas present. What a great selection, she loves it and the expression on her face when she opened the gift was priceless. It came with all the accessories needed to get her started and a DVD that contained user instructions. Easy to use and best of all, it takes GREAT pictures.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: blue angel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter she can't seem to put it down this was a good buy for the price and I would certainly recommend this to others

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Charlene Esposito
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this camera SOOO much. My eyes are going so the auto focus feature was a MUST HAVE for me.  And this setup was the perfect starter set for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted this for x-mas, I had no idea about any of it, still don't.  However, on x-mas the brother-in-law was very impressed with the camera and both lenses.  He was rambling on about how nice it was and a bunch of features that it has that are great, really I myself have no opinion about it other than it cost me a good deal of change, but everyone who knows anything about cameras has said that it is a very nice camera and the extra lens in good as well.  I couldn't tell you if its a good deal or not,  the wife wanted it so I bought it.  Happy wife.

Reviews.Title: My new goal
Reviews.Author: Joe Fults
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  You can turn it on and take great pictures from the get go, or you can study a lot and really customize your photography - or anything in between.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it.  It is total overkill for what she needed but it was such a great combo pack that I couldn't pass up this deal.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: MsAnnie
Reviews.Content: At first, I cried.  It seemed so complicated, I'd never be able to use it.  I slowed down, and I learn something different every week.  It's really good.  Would have given it a 5 star, except that the difference between the two lenses is so great, I miss some shots because there's no middle ground.  But - other than that, it's been great.  I have some lovely, lovely pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and great camera
Reviews.Author: Wendi P "Wendi"
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this product.  Everything we needed was included, for a fair price.  The camera is easy-to-use, and the photo quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect entry level DSLR kit!
Reviews.Author: David Nulter "Interceptor"
Reviews.Content: Item arrived on time and was exactly as described.  The camera was listed as Used, but everything was in original packaging and looked like new.  Charged battery and was able to begin using immediately yielding high quality results.

Reviews.Title: Great starter kit
Reviews.Author: meesh
Reviews.Content: This is a great combination of products to get started in the SLR camera world. Shots I have taken indoors with the 18-55 lens are sharp and clear. Can't wait to get outside to try the 75-300 lens!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures, Great Video
Reviews.Author: Cody Carlson
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer and have no pretensions to be one.  I bought the Canon Rebel T3 on the recommendation of a friend and primarily bought it to make video and for the occasional photo opportunity.  I'm sure I don't know a 10th of what this camera is really capable of.  All that said, I am very satisfied with it.  The pictures look great and I am very impressed with the video as well.  I'm still experimenting with the audio; I'm not 100% sold on the mic yet, but I'll have to do more with it before I can comment further.  On the whole, however I am impressed.  I believe amateurs out there like me will really appreciate this easy-to-use, great looking camera.  Additionally, the items that come in this package are all impressive.  Extra battery, memory card, bag, tripod, extra lens, and more all appear to be top notch.  Maybe the professionals will be able to nit-pick, but I consider the Cannon Rebel T3 to be just what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm
Reviews.Author: A. K. Gordon, III
Reviews.Content: My daughter used one of these cameras in a college photography class.  The college provided a "loaner" camera.  My daughter fell in love with it and was devastated when it had to be returned.  I purchased the camera as a Christmas present, and my daughter says it is the best Christmas present she has ever received!  ("What about the Apple laptop?"  "That was for college.")My daughter never leaves home without it.

Reviews.Title: Everthing I expected
Reviews.Author: Lynelle Boucher
Reviews.Content: It was everything I expected. Everthing I needed to get started taking awesome pictures was included. Would highly recomend this item to others.

Reviews.Title: Love this bundle value
Reviews.Author: Mamacat
Reviews.Content: Was shopping Black Friday sale ads and checked Amazon.  This bundle pack far exceeded values in stores - and no waiting in line.  The camera is fantastic.  Easy to operate for beginners (automatic settings) and intermediates who like to compose their own picture (manual settings).  Bonus add-ons of card, cleaning kit and tripod are also fantastic.  Will probably replace the bag for one more padded in the immediate future as I really want to protect this baby.  You can truly call the extra lens a "bonus" as everyday price of just the camera equals this entire set.  The lens retails for over $200.00.  Would have turned right around and bought it anyway, so already having it thrown in for free was unbelievable!  Highly recommend this camera to anyone who wants fantastic pictures, from the novice to the serious hobbyist.  My photos look so professional.  First picture was of a cardinal in the snow through the window and you can actually see the snow falling.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Real value
Reviews.Author: Maria Farias
Reviews.Content: Great package! Real value. The camera to is easy to use and the extras included are very helpful. The extra battery was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Cannon
Reviews.Author: Charles Bolden
Reviews.Content: We've only have a little rime with this camera, so we're learning about it. To this point we're very happy with the Cannon

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Rita C. Gaither
Reviews.Content: My daughter was very excited to receive this camera she loves to take pictures Great love it very happy with this item

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: tina m. avery-ritchie
Reviews.Content: Everything you need to get started.  Great for beginners or professionals. Takes beautiful photos. This will be used in a college photography class.

Reviews.Title: great product so far
Reviews.Author: jack whisenhunt
Reviews.Content: havnt had alot of time to use but what it has been used great, cant wait to try big lense

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: J.S. White
Reviews.Content: After doing lots of comparison shopping and talking to owners of similar cameras,we chose this one because it is lightweight , easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Donna McGhie
Reviews.Content: After checking out cameras in the stores for a gift for my daughter and her family, I found this kit on Amazon. My daughter has two sons who are active in dirt bike riding and football. She was so happy when she opened the box, that she cried! They had been wanting a camera and have needed one for some time.  She has been clicking away since Christmas!  The camera is easy to use from the start and it takes excellent pictures. What a great package deal!

Reviews.Title: Delighted.
Reviews.Author: Donna Toten
Reviews.Content: Husband delighted with camera.  He is still learning all about it. He has been wanting one for several years.  Maybe now he will quit drooling over camera displays when we go shopping.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is a tremendous entry-level DSLR. Images are professional and clear. The items that come with the package are EVERYTHING you need to get started. Taking a photography class and every item he recommended purchasing was included in this offer. So incredibly happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R. Oleary
Reviews.Content: This kit is great, it is my third Canon camera and the ef lenses fit all of my others.Takes a great picture. I bought one for myself and one for my girlfriend. Great for the amateur or professional photographerI would always recommend Canon

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Saraina M. Wise
Reviews.Content: I got this camera set as a gift for someone. It was great! The package came fast, good service, etc. My only problem was when we opened the pouch that held the camera bag, we saw a lot of dirt on the camera bag. It looked as though it got wet. Not too big of a deal, we can clean it. Other than that, everything was good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Koller "smasher"
Reviews.Content: It's not the camera, but the person behind it. I do love this camera and I get great pictures. The kit is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Alyce Carroll
Reviews.Content: For several years now I have been using a "Point and Shoot" camera and wanted to go back to something better.  In the past I have had a Canon AE1 plus others so I was comfortable purchasing another Canon.  I have been looking at this one for a while and decided the time was right.  Several of my friends are professionals and they either use this or recommend it.  A good buy both quality and the amount of supplies included.

Reviews.Title: extraordinary photo
Reviews.Author: Anderson Rincones
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good, I really like I'm very happy with the performance, the pictures obtained are really very good

Reviews.Title: good deal good stuff my son love it and love me
Reviews.Author: Luisa Costa
Reviews.Content: this camera it was a Christmas present for my son he love it, he very happy and still playing with his new toy. Is a very good deal for the price. Has all you need to start, i know that camera because a gave one to my daughter last Christmas. i strongly recommended. good deal good stuff.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: cm
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for about a month and have had really good success out of it. The kit was a great bargain; even just getting the bag and extra lens would have been worth it, but this came with tons of useful stuff. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome price.
Reviews.Author: Vickie Hawkins
Reviews.Content: Originally purchased this camera at Best Buy for $300 more!  Found it on Amazon on Black Friday for a price too good to pass up!  Arrived in perfect condition and when it was supposed to.  It was perfect!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS
Reviews.Author: Harriett Dech
Reviews.Content: I got this for a Christmas present, so I really don't know about the camera until my daughter gets it,but I received the product so fast and didn't have to worry about getting on time. I love the idea that everything was all in the box,so I know my daughter will have everything to get started, Thank You!

Reviews.Title: best deal anywhere
Reviews.Author: kenneth  hulley
Reviews.Content: For the price it was and what was there it was the best deal I could find counting the stores and the Internet .The quality of the item was over the top

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Maida Torres
Reviews.Content: I still can't believe that there was so much for such a great price. It was such a great deal that I couldn't pass it up.

Reviews.Title: Bulky with low-quality accessaries..
Reviews.Author: Michael Damena
Reviews.Content: I did not even open the camera.. I had to return it after looking at the bulky camera case and all the accessaries. It is over-priced considering the low-quality items surrounding a camera with a great brand. Instead, I bought an T3i with 18 MP and no accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: noliboy
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera at a very good price.The tripod that came with it is the only drawback. I would definitely recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, it's so versatile and not too heavy.  One of the pieces in the kit (the memory card USB adapter) broke after just a few uses, but I didn't need it- my computer has a place to insert the memory card directly.  Even minus that one item, this package is a great value.  Shipping was fast, and everything was packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Marilyn K Mowrey
Reviews.Content: Love it - still learning the in's and out's - but perfect for the beginner/wanna be. I think the tripod is steady, learning to use the extra zoom lens, a great buy overall.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: KSGirl
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived quickly and was well-packaged.  I love that this comes with everything you need.  The only thing I bought separately was a lens protector for the longer lens.  I like the small size and light weight.  I like that it takes video, as well as photos.  I've enjoyed using the CA (creative auto) feature and shooting in monochromatic.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Poor Accessory
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: I am mostly pleased with this purchase.  The camera and zoom lens are great.  The card could be of better quality, but you can't really complain too much when you pay $300 or $400 less than list price for a product.  The only thing that really bothers me - and I'm sure this is not indicative of all of the bundles - is the zipper for the tripod bag.  The zipper was missing when I opened the box.  Now that I've opened the bag, I cannot close it.  This is a minor inconvenience, but an inconvenience all the same.  Had it not been for this, I would have given five stars.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Mckenzie Borszich
Reviews.Content: I'ts such a good camera and I love the 75-300mm lens! Also, with the tripod, it's even better! I'm so happy that it comes with the extra battery, too!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this kit, and choice of T3 over T3i
Reviews.Author: Jonathan R Cooke
Reviews.Content: I spent a while considering between the T3 and the T3i, and decided to go with the T3. Although it’s not as many megapixels, it’s perfectly fine for the sizes of shots I take, plus the older T3 has some advantages over the newer and most costly T3i in that the T3 has a much longer battery life (around double) and for taking photos in burst mode the T3 can buffer 830 (at 3 frames per second) while the T3i can only handle 34 before the buffer fills. Very happy with my choice, the price, and the on time shipping. The only con of the kit for me was that the tripod is a bit flimsy, so I bought a sturdier one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a beginner!
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: My first DSLR and still learning the ropes, but love it so far. I m sure I could give a better review if I was more experienced, but I do feel it is a great quality camera, not to mention the great price and extras included. Shipping was on time with about 30 minutes to spare!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and kit as a starter kit
Reviews.Author: Kenneth West
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present and love it. It takes wonderful pictures and as a starter setup you can't really complain. The bag is cheap and one of the clips on the strap broke shortly after receiving it. The tripod is very light but works.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money!
Reviews.Author: Dr David W Scott
Reviews.Content: Really nice camera. Feels great in hand and is light weight enough not to be a bother carrying around for long periods of time. Great package for first timers. It's all you need.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for beginners!
Reviews.Author: Bethany L. Marrs
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera several months ago and could not be happier.  We wanted something that would deliver clear pictures and give us an opportunity to do a little more than a point and shoot.  This is just the camera for that!  Can't say enough positive things about it.

Reviews.Title: Buy this and here is why
Reviews.Author: winnie
Reviews.Content: Great, great, this was a birthday present to my 17 year old grandson, he takes photo class in high school and needed a better camera. this  set had all that he needed for class and more.  He takes really good pictures but now with all the new equipment and camera they are really better and he receives many compliments on all his projects.  I also look for prices that were affordable and this was it.  Great starter camera for those that want a good one but new, the directions and CD make it easy to follow and learn by

Reviews.Title: Happy exploration
Reviews.Author: K. Frick "frumie"
Reviews.Content: I decided to graduate from a high end point-and-shoot to a camera that actually helped me grow in skills.  The Rebel T3 has proved to be both user-friendly and an avenue for experimentaion.  The dealer had my camera package to me in a timely fashion and at what I consider to be a very good price.  The fact that two lens (18-55mm and 75-300mm) were included means I can take photos almost everywhere I go.  Right now the camera is traveling with me all the time and I'm finding something interesting to shoot every day.  I highly recomend both the camera and the dealer.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Deal!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Awesome deal!  Great camera and accessories galore!  Love all the thing this camera is capable of doing!  Easy to use and love the bag

Reviews.Title: Beginners camera
Reviews.Author: Kailyn Joy Dekker
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing pictures and is easy to control and use. I recommend this camera for all beginner photographers out there. The accessories included were however for the most part very cheap.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Sonya
Reviews.Content: Thanks so much - am taking some awesome hockey pictures of my son and will soon of my daughter playing volleyball!

Reviews.Title: Was a Gift
Reviews.Author: Wilmer Brown
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for our Grand Daughter, she was thrilled for she is taking a class in school and it more than fits her needs.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Bargain for professional  grade equipment
Reviews.Author: Steven R. Chapman
Reviews.Content: I couldn't believe it when I saw the add.  I just had to order to make sure it was real and "By Golly" it was.  I've had some time now to work with the camera and love it!!  All of the accessories included with this bargain are just great.  Great value for an extremely reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great kit for beginners
Reviews.Author: Erin  Witowski
Reviews.Content: I'm a beginner in photography and ordered this kit because of all the accessories included. Everything came completely packaged and it is a great value for everything included! I've never taken such great pictures before my DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Good package
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Loved this package. It has so many things but even just the camera, it's amazing, plus the extra lens is a plus. I would recommend this product. It came on time in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Martin Bailey
Reviews.Content: I am still learning all the functions of this camera but it has met all my expectations to date. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: This is What I ordered
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Brimmage
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item because of prior experience with a like item.  I was pleased with it so I bought another one for a friend.  The time it took to get it here was much sooner than I expected.  Every thing was received in perfect working order.  I could not be happier with the customer service or the product.  Canon EOS Rebel T3 is the Greatest camera that I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Bety Sabalza
Reviews.Content: I love it! This is an awesome deal! I got the complete kit! I love the lenses, the camera is awesome, I'm still playing with it but is awesome for new photographers like me =)

Reviews.Title: Great value for a user friendly camera
Reviews.Author: Lonn
Reviews.Content: Camera and attachments arrived as promised in excellent condition. Both the user manual and the disk provided practical insrructions. So far, so good. Looking forward to many years of use of this camera system.

Reviews.Title: BEST Canon BUNDLE
Reviews.Author: WATERFALL
Reviews.Content: The 10 piece bundle is an AMAZING assortment of TOP QUALITY items that a novice like myself would find difficult to shop each piece at one sitting.  This was my granddaughter's 18th Birthday present and she was so excited to get everything in one box.  Great equipment at a very AFFORDABLE price and ON TIME shipping. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love My Camera
Reviews.Author: LMM
Reviews.Content: I bought myself this camera as a present and I am very happy with my purchase. It came with A LOT of extras which was nice and the price couldn't be beat. The only issue I have is the external drive to load pictures onto the computer isn't compatible with my laptop for some reason. Every single time I plug it in it tells me I have to format my SD card and I can't upload pictures because it will erase them if I format it. So I ended up just having to use the cord that came with the camera and hook my camera directly up to the computer. Easy fix but still a little annoying at first when I lost some pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 camera
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!!  user friendly, full auto when I want to concentrate on the scene but all the "bells and whistles" if I want to get creative and experiment with aperture and focus.  Much more lightweight than an earlier version I has looked at.  The images are clear, just a dream of a camera--why did I try any other brand?????

Reviews.Title: Canon rebel t3i
Reviews.Author: Brena
Reviews.Content: It is far better than any camera I've ever had. It takes a lot of time to understand the camera completely. I bought canon for dummies which has helped. I'm still learning how to take night pictures of kids. It blurs really bad.  But for the most part I've been very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: K Cumbie
Reviews.Content: Camera is great for beginners! The tripod is a little light but works. It take beautiful pictures and the DVD is very informative!

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle of Products!
Reviews.Author: Tricia L. Pankonin
Reviews.Content: I am beyond happy with this purchase! This is my first SLR camera and I am so happy I could get this bundle because I wasn't sure what all I would need. The bundle made it easy!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Starter Kit
Reviews.Author: Luis Diego Soto
Reviews.Content: Includes all the basic components for photograph enthusiasts, buying the items separately could have costed as much as twice the original price.

Reviews.Title: camera pack
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: the camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.  although I haven't used tri-pod yet it seems little unsteady.  we will see

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: spottedmamma
Reviews.Content: This has been the best camera I have ever owned.  It is easy to use, lightweight and the quality of the pictures you get is amazing.  I highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to make a great investment on memories!

Reviews.Title: Wedding Pictures
Reviews.Author: G. Kelsey
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a gift for my daughter's friend who is an excellent photographer.  His wedding gift to my daughter was to be her photographer.  The least I could do is get him a camera.  He used it for the wedding pictures.  They came out great!!!

Reviews.Title: Be a professional photographer.
Reviews.Author: sheena
Reviews.Content: Ever want to take professional pictures? Now you can, and you get a lot with it! Shots looks very nice, Great camera to start out with.

Reviews.Title: A fun alternative to a pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Tim Tuohy "Tp2e"
Reviews.Content: It's always good to get more than you expect.  I hope I can get as good with this as my old friend Steve.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: This is a great package deal. I have been watching and waiting to get this camera. I not only got the camera but everything ells I needed too.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Saxton "Olde Tyme Farmer"
Reviews.Content: The complete package arrived in good condition. The camera setup was easy and after charging the battery I began using the camera--The tutorial is well written and using the CD for that purpose is very helpful.  Because the camera has so many features it will take a while to be well versed in all of its features. An excellent price for an excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Richard Kidder
Reviews.Content: We have had no issues with any of the equipment and we are very pleased with the performance and the value.

Reviews.Title: Nice shots
Reviews.Author: chic shopper
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR camera. I wasn't sure what my needs would be in terms of accessories so I thought it would be a good idea to purchase this kit which included a bunch of things I might need. I'm still learning how to use the camera but so far it's fun and takes nice pictures in auto mode. It's a perfect camera for me, a beginner. It's a bit noisy, sounds like I'm racking a shotgun when the flash pops up.This kit is a good value. The inclusion of the telephoto zoom lens alone would have made this a well priced purchase. I found it difficult to get a crystal clear shot with the telephoto lens because it's slow and not easy to hold steady unless it's on the tripod.It's great to have an extra battery so you never have to worry about being left with a dead battery in a place where charging is not possible. The bag is a definite necessity. It's small, but it fits the camera and a few extras. If you add up the price of all these things separately, the cost would be much higher. The card reader did not work for me but I can upload pics easily without it.The company was very helpful and quick to answer my questions.Good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Minnie H
Reviews.Content: I sold my Olympus E420 so that I could buy this camera! It is one of the best digital cameras I have ever owned or used. Takes awesome photos and it's so easy to use. I would recommend this camera to everyone if you are an experienced photographer or just starting out. The videos on the Canon website helped me to understand how to use all the settings. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: vickie
Reviews.Content: I love this.i was afraid it would be too complicated for me but it was self explanatory and user friendly.i love it

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Reviews.Content: Camera and extra lens are good deal.  It's nice to have the bag, card, tripod and cords.  As others have said, the quality in the extras is not through the roof.  But they are serviceable.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter set for someone interested in learning slr cameras.
Reviews.Author: crafter5
Reviews.Content: Nice starter set for someone interested in learning slr cameras without breaking the bank. Everything included as discribed. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: maz
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, love the telephoto lens. Easy to use. It is a great camera for my first DSLR!

Reviews.Title: Awesome but
Reviews.Author: Dh
Reviews.Content: It's the entire package needed! Great camera! Extra battery, both lens'. You couldn't buy separately for the same price. Super pleased.

Reviews.Title: OBSESSEDDDDD
Reviews.Author: Akemi
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting to get a DSLR camera for a while and this comes with SO much!! I have no idea how it was so cheap! But I got 2 lenses, a bunch of other stuff like a tripod, neck strap, memory card, sd card reader, cleaning kit, etc. I am so happy!!Oh and it also takes great pictures haha.

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: This is just a great set anyone can afford since it has everything one needs. At least it met m expectations. I can get wonderful shots I couldn't get with my previous Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful kit
Reviews.Author: Ken Wheat
Reviews.Content: I love the camera  , the only thing I didn't like was the flimsy tripod,  the small table tripod is also useless.  I ordered a much sturdier tripod,

Reviews.Title: Great package!
Reviews.Author: Lynn  Mahaffy
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a great package.  It came quickly and so far has performed beautifully.  Once I got a smartcard that is.  That did seem kind of like an odd thing to not have in the package and was frustrating not to be able to be able to start playing with it until I got a card.  Once in though it's been fun to use and has been everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Awesome DEAL great product
Reviews.Author: x
Reviews.Content: Perfect combination of all the quality items, I did not see a price that could beat this deal.Only the tripod's legs are a bit skinny but everything else is awesome.This is a professional studio / travelers kit. There is nothing else you'll need.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Louan Suttle
Reviews.Content: Excellent Canon Camera Bundle, enjoying it. It was great to get all of the accessories together like that. Received it when it was suppose to.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kaye Henry
Reviews.Content: Loved the camera.  The camera bag that shipped with the bundle is only big enough for the camera and the small lens.  Not nearly enough room for all the gear.  Otherwise, I am very pleased

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: PP
Reviews.Content: I think this is the best offer i could find for a DSLR camera and also the best offer that i've bought in amazon. If you want a pro camera this is the one

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal!!!!
Reviews.Author: NannyK
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome!!!  I have the model before this at work, which is basically the same camera except it doesn't have video.  This one has video (which I haven't tried yet) and all the accessories.  What makes it so amazing is the zoom lens that you get (about $150-200 alone).  The camera alone is about $500-600, so basically I purchased the camera and got everything else for free.  You can't get a better deal than this.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: william m.
Reviews.Content: just getting into the digital world, use to my old k-1000, found the camera easy to navigate, pics are very good

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Obrien
Reviews.Content: Great quality, works great. A great buy. I'd recommend this camera to anyone wanting to take great pictures. It comes with everything shown.

Reviews.Title: Present for the wife
Reviews.Author: kyle pearson
Reviews.Content: She loves it. Of course she'll never figure out how to really use it to its potential, but it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for beginners.
Reviews.Author: Jose R.
Reviews.Content: It doesn't have a lot of features to bothering for.  Just set it in an automatic shooting mode and start taking wonderful photos that will have you look as a professional.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel
Reviews.Author: Marci Brown
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use.  I am taking all of the pictures for my business with this camera and it is working perfectly.  Love Canon cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle
Reviews.Author: Harry Le Grande
Reviews.Content: I am not much of a camera buff but my daughter told me about this deal.  I saw hers and had to have it.  As I prepare for retirement I think I may pick up photography as a hobby.

Reviews.Title: ???PRICE???
Reviews.Author: Ricky Pettis
