Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new camera, however, now that I have spent some time looking, I am not sure if I got the best price. But like I said, I am still very happy with my new outfit.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this as my first DSLR camera.  It was so easy to use right front the get go.  I have taken photos that are amazing quality and look professional.  I am very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera and Lenses
Reviews.Author: Melinda luscomb
Reviews.Content: I love my camera and the Lenses. However, the tripod broke the 2nd time I tried to use it. In addition, the bag ripped shortly after I purchased the kit. I wish that these bundles came with some extra lense covers, however. I always seem to lose mine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: J-HRODE "JWH"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and produces incredible pictures.  We take it everywhere and don't miss any of our kids special moments

Reviews.Title: It's good for what it is
Reviews.Author: Dinodude101
Reviews.Content: The Camera itself works great though I was expecting it to have custom options with video mode. That one's my fault. Both lenses also work really well with the exception of manual focus on the 18-55mm. The focus ring isn't secured and can move a lot when focusing. The tripod is pretty sucky as expected. Even when locked down, it still moves when the camera is attached. The SD card reader is also pretty sucky. The cap is extremely loose and sometimes when I upload picture or video, it will just shut off. Once it even deleted all the data. The camera bag is quite useful when it comes to storage. I like it and the battery as well. Just the other day, I accidentally left it in my pants pocket and ran it through the wash, when it was done and I saw the battery, I put it in a container of rice for a day, and it worked perfectly! The memory card wallet cheaply made and ripped within the first month of use. Last but not least, the cleaning kit. It might just be me but when ever i try to use the micro fiber clothe, it leaves smudges on the lens. Thats why I got a lens pen. Its super convenient! All in all, The whole kit is good for beginners such as myself. Its, overall, pretty cheap and a good starting point.

Reviews.Title: Easy of use...
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures but the great part was the ease of use. We will probably get another camera bag but it got use through our first trip.

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bogar
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. The camera is pro grade and yet is good for a beginer.It feels good,it looks good and takes great pictures.can not beat it with a stick. Go to youtube tutorial and see what the pros say

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ORIGINALLY FELL IN LOVE WITH THE CANON REBEL 35MM CAMERA WHEN I WAS 16 ... AND NOW I HAVE THIS AND I LOVE IT FOREVER ... IM  SO UNBELIEVABLY HAPPY

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Yash522
Reviews.Content: Package came as described, but did not have the coupon code for free 25 photo prints.Camera is outstanding, works well for both wide & normal angle lens

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: alesha carter
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love the camera! both lens are by canon which is what i was worried about at first. the only thing is that the second lens doesn't have a stabilizer. im hoping that wont be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great features in the camera
Reviews.Author: F. Hoyte
Reviews.Content: Have not had the chance to go through the hard copy manual or the CD on the operations, but looks pretty goodHaving gone through the manual, I am pleased to report that the use of the 18-55 mm lens gives great results and It will definitely take better and sharper pictures for the magazine which my Men's Fellowship is producing for it's 50 anniversary

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Krystal Davenport
Reviews.Content: This Camera that I've only had for a few weeks is a good camera, takes great pictures and will probably take even better pictures once I learn how to use it better. For a beginner it might be complicated like it is for me right now, it will be a learning process in using it. I have a newborn and I mostly got it for kid pictures but when my baby is sleeping and I'm trying to get a photo the Canon camera's are loud so it sometimes wakes baby. I did not know this prior to my purchase. The carrying bag is OK for a now I will upgrade to a much better quality bag when I can. The card reader only works when it wants too. I suggest buying a better qaulity one of those as well, do not rely soley on the one in this bundle. I would not characterize the "extra's" in this bundle high quailty. The extra lense however has been great so far. But I haven't used it a whole lot. Over all I'm please but I do wish I would have gone to somewhere like Best Buy and tested out different camera brands to see what I like best and done a little more research before make such a large purchase.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and more!!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca K.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! I started with a Canon so I think of myself as partial to the brand but this camera really blew me away. The ease of use is what I realy love about Canon. As an ametur photographer I know that I will get the best shot I can with this camera. i recomend buying any package that comes with at least one lens and a tripod..the extra battery really comes in handy too although the battery life is great. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Zöe
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my bf for Christmas because he wanted a "fancy camera" and he has loved using it and trying all the different settings etc.  I saw a review saying the camera case was not the one advertised but I got the one the posting said I would get. Such a great starter package for the aspiring photographer, so much so I enjoyed using it myself even though I was never a huge picture-taker. Would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Grace Barber
Reviews.Content: I am an aspiring photographer just getting my business up and running and I have only had the chance to use this out a few times and I am in love with it. I started out with a GE 16.0 megapixel and this is such an upgrade!! My husband bought this Canon for me a few months ago and we can't wait to start shooting when the weather warms up. The DOF is amazing, the quality of prints are spot on and its very easy to use. I am currently working on manual mode but for now Auto suits me just fine until I learn more. I think every photographer should own this camera. I also use it to record videos I put on YouTube when I sing and even that is great! All positive feedback from me and the price was a bit high but VERY worth it.

Reviews.Title: It is a great product
Reviews.Author: HERBERT MANZANO AYALA
Reviews.Content: Canon has develop a great product which it's wonder: I've taked photos and I never thought it was just photos. For me, all accesories are very usefull because I can do many activities whith it.

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Frog Lady
Reviews.Content: I love this new camera.  I am looking forward to many years of great pictures of my family and Yosemite.

Reviews.Title: This is what Awesome is all about!
Reviews.Author: J. Archuleta
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this camera, inside and out. The quality,the everything of this camera is extremely awesome! If I could I would marry it. Enough said.

Reviews.Title: Great all-in-one kit
Reviews.Author: Maverick
Reviews.Content: I could not ask for a better starter kit. all kinds of extras that will be useful as i start learning. My only issue is the bag felt a little flimsy & unsecure, i went with something more robust and closable

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mitzen
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera!! I am so happy with everthing I got. The camera bag is big and I love the tripod!! The camera takes wonderful pictures!!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD everything without complaining the camera performs wonderfully and ACCESSORIES ARE ALL PREMIUM
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD everything without complaining the camera performs wonderfully and ACCESSORIES ARE ALL PREMIUM . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Good experience
Reviews.Author: Ayla
Reviews.Content: came really quick in the mail , only forgot my memory card but problem was solved right away.  good experience.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Mandy Ulvestad
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed our Canon T3, we are still learning how to use it, but so far so good, great picture quality

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product, Awesome Seller
Reviews.Author: ARisso
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this purchase. It arrived on time with absolutely everything listed in the description. I did notice the camera bag didn't seem super great, but it definitely didn't break the first time I unclipped it and hasn't broken yet either. It does have a 5-year guarantee though! I did have a problem with the USB/Card Reader: it broke the very first time I used it. I wrote to the seller and within just  a few hours they had already shipped out a brand new one. I think I just happened to get a bad one out of the bunch. My seller was Beach Camera and they were fantastic. I will definitely check their site first if I ever want to buy other camera products. This is an awesome item. If you're considering getting a DSLR, get this one!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera package!
Reviews.Author: Eric V
Reviews.Content: I wanted a DSLR camera, but dident have a ton of money to spend! I took the plunge and went with the Canon EOS Rebel T3 and have no regret's what so ever!! By the way! If you are worried about the EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens having no IS, dont be! This lens work's great hand held,fully zoomed to 300mm at a higher shutter speed with no problem's! If i had to complain about one thing, it would be the 3 frames per second Drive mode( I wish it was faster!) . For the money this can not be beat! I love it and it takes tack sharp photo's with a photographer's, good shooting tecnique!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Ronsreads
Reviews.Content: This was really a great deal.  The Camera was exactly as ordered.The only problem I had was the remote that came with the kit was not compatible with the camera.I ended up giving it to one of my daughter-in-laws so it wasn't a waste.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Spike's Son "Big Guy"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera package. Works great. Easy to use. I like it a lot Would recommend to all, especially photo enthusiasts.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level camera
Reviews.Author: Fábio
Reviews.Content: Great to shoot photos landscape or macros. Easy to handle and to set, it has a lot of pre-sets and all manual. Light-weighted, it great to be portable. Make sure you buy a decent case and go shooting.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rod Clarkson
Reviews.Content: Great camera. I would recommend it to anyone. This was a nice bundle. It has everything you need for point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Larry Wise
Reviews.Content: It exceeded my expectations by miles.The ease of operation is a real plus, it's lightweight and the two lenses that came with it give me all kinds of photo possibilities; way more than the digital camera that I was using. And another plus is all of the accessories that came with it, all of this for a really great price.I will recommend this camera and kit to anyone who is interested in this type of camera.

Reviews.Title: All perfect
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: You hace TO know how TO use it, but its great.Takes really good pictures. Buy it now!!!! Good bye.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Zaeed
Reviews.Content: The tripod is a little flimsy but it was not the reason I purchased it. The deal on the camera (and extra lens) itself was great enough. Plus the 16 GB memory card and the extra battery made things even better. Really worth the money! I use the pouch (kit) very carefully but so far it has been greatsince the camera AND both lenses fit in it.I even got things that may come in handy like the lens cleaner and the memory card wallet.About the tripod: The first time i used it, little bolts and nuts, and screws came off but they can easily be put back from the bottom of each connections. Don't unscrew anything too much and it should be okay. The tripod is fine but I won't rely too heavily on it.Overall the camera is awesome, great picture quality and easy to use. The EF 75- 300mm lens is pretty awesome too and good for portraiture. So 5 stars =)

Reviews.Title: super great
Reviews.Author: Kim kellstadt
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter.  The kit was very nice for the price. You get everything you need for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle
Reviews.Author: Chris Tibbles
Reviews.Content: Everything you need.  Camera was easy to start just shooting with the different presets.  Once you get into all the settings the camera is limitless in the professional quality photos you can take.  Worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Ramon Costales
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. Great gift for my wife. i am very pleased with everything and the service was excellant!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the next move
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: For the growing photographer this package deal is great!  I purchased for my wife and she has moved from Nikon to this Canon and the Canon is much easier to operate.  The total kit puts the camera at a new level of use for her.

Reviews.Title: Christmas!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it! We wanted a camera that we could take normal pictures and also take to an auditorium and still get up close pictures. It takes video too, and has an auto focus if you dont want to do it yourself. This was a great deal I got from Beach Camera, I like it so much I'm tempted to get another for myself!

Reviews.Title: Great Find
Reviews.Author: Gunnar
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at cameras for months. This was an amazing find so I purchased it for my husband as a Christmas gift. He loves it. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: This Little Book Nerd
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother for Christmas and of course she loved it.  It came with everything she could ask for.  Takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Denise A. Ireland
Reviews.Content: I love the product!  I have been researching a new DSLR camera and this package meets all my needs!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great combo kit
Reviews.Author: D. K. Walston "Ken W"
Reviews.Content: I liked the kit, it allowed me to purchase the items I was looking for at a better price than buying individually

Reviews.Title: Great price for the package!
Reviews.Author: Alan Michaud
Reviews.Content: The delivery of the package was timely and as described.  The accessories included along with the camera made it an even bigger bargain.  I shopped just the camera and the additional lens and the price was more than the camera andall the additional items that were included in this package.  The camera works great!  The only thing I didn't like was that there was no paperwork along with the shipment, no packing slip, invoice/bill of sale.

Reviews.Title: T3
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: I had the T3 for about 2 weeks and although it is extremely good at taking pictures especially in low to little light situations I decided to buy the T4i granted for the price there is nothing wrong with the T3, I highly recommend it to anyone needing to save About $500.00 compared to the T4i.You won't be disapointed at all with the T3 it is an awesome camera. The main reason for me returning the T3 is that (unless I'm mistaken) there is no video playback on the camera itself so you can't playback without hooking it up to a T.V. or computer ( please correct me if I'm wrong about that point).If your looking for a low cost high quality camera get the T3 you'll love it. The T4i does have alot more features then the T3 however you pay for them as the T4i is usually more then double the price of the T3.So if you plan on purchasing the T3 I'm sure you'll love it as I stated before you can't go wrong with it and  was especially pleasantly ssusrprized at the awesome quality of pictures taken in low light without using or needing a flash. Also The T3 makes great black and white photo's and also allows you to shoot in Raw format as well as a few others, allowing you more ease at editing etc. Good luck

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: iubaby
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price,, the 300mm zoom lens is great at the kids sporting events. Have a great camera for any event we go to.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING PRICE
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Fugarino "Karen"
Reviews.Content: My husband was so excited to recieve the Canon EOS Rebel T3 and its numerous accessories for Christmas!! He couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera. Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Rebel T3 because I want to get back into photography. Automatic digital cameras are fine for snapshots, but when I wanted to enlarge my photos to 8x10 and even sometimes 5x7, I wasn't always able to do so. I bought the Canon EOS Rebel T3 for my place of work when they decided they needed a better camera. After searching many resources, I chose the T3 because it is easy to use - anyone at work can pick it up and take a picture without being intimidated by a large camera, and it also has manual settings. Once I saw how nice the camera was for work, I bought one for myself for home! I will be very happy with this camera for a long time. I do intend to take some photography classes to help me better understand the best way to adjust the camera manually - lighting, speed, etc. The package included a tripod, extra zoom lens, storage device, extra battery pack, and more. It was all I needed to start taking beautiful pictures!

Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: Sinan Hashim "Sinan"
Reviews.Content: I bout one for me and three of my friends bought the same one after they tried it.All are very happy with it

Reviews.Title: It is a Canon and that says it all.
Reviews.Author: David Gimpelson
Reviews.Content: The camera lives up to any expectation.  I don't use any of the automatic, point and shoot settings, but for the user who likes those, this is a good camera.  I use all the manual settings and like the ease of use and the quality of results.  The camera has a solid feel that I like.  The lenses also work very well with screw on extension tubes for close up work.  I've owned a Canon in the past and will go to Canon again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Bostonbean
Reviews.Content: I received this from my husband for my Birthday and it is one amazing bundle.  It comes with everything you need to get started.  The camera takes amazing pictures!  The only thing I bought extra was the hdmi cable to hook up to tv for playback.  Amazing price and quick shipping as always.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Boyens
Reviews.Content: We received our camera and kit in rapid time in excellent condition.  Having all of hte pieces of this kit come together was a great blessing.  The tripod is small and works well.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: TW
Reviews.Content: Wife bought this for my first Packer game and it worked fantastic. I have had a lot of cameras but this is by far my favorite camera I have had thus far. Easy to use and takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Kemp
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! It's user friendly and has amazing picture quality!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Josh Hansen
Reviews.Content: The Price I got on Black Friday is the same price just the camera costs at Target.Everything is great about this camera....no Cons

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CSF
Reviews.Content: Having a lot of fun with this camera. Easy to use and takes wonderful pictures. Lots of features make this camera very versitile

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: sandra bybee
Reviews.Content: it was a great price and value for what i purchased. always pays to shop around and get the best deal

Reviews.Title: Camera set
Reviews.Author: Sue Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it but have fabulous Christmas pictures and looking forward to prying it out of my daughters hands to learn more

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Sandy G
Reviews.Content: i really love this new camera, it is easy to use and takes great pictures, what else could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Very nice set
Reviews.Author: Sheri Hatten
Reviews.Content: I bought this set for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! All items exactly as described and I didn't find the tripod flimsy as other described. I received the wrong extra battery, but the seller was quick to replace it with the correct battery. Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Canon T3
Reviews.Author: Ewwilson3
Reviews.Content: Purchased as gift for my daughter, who is a budding photographer. The package was promptly delivered, as promised. The camera, while not the most current model, is still a very good piece of equipment and was priced very fairly. My daughter is thrilled with it. 4 stars only because it is an older model. A great buy.

Reviews.Title: great price for this grouping
Reviews.Author: rene
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a reasonable price on a quality camera for a teenager beginner...This kit has so many extras and the camera is rated well.  Great Deal!

Reviews.Title: very good option
Reviews.Author: roberto somocurcio
Reviews.Content: it's perfect for me; simple, professional, and easy.take photos quickly, good quality, excellent design, weight, and overall use is very simple.Its only flaw is that the HDMI cable is hard to find.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the camera and all of the extras.  My husband is using it every day.  If anyone is looking for a good quality camera, this is the one we would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Mysels
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera and accessories for my daughter as a graduation present and she absolutely loves it. I would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: This camera package was a great deal. Came with more than everything you needed. Back up battery was a nice perk.  Used this camera for our family vacation.  It was easy to use and the pictures came out great.  We ran into another tourist with the same camera, Amazon had a fantastic deal and price compared to the photo store.  Would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Not a professional...awesome package!
Reviews.Author: C. Hoffmeyer
Reviews.Content: This really is a steal! I wanted a nice camera before we start having kids and this package did not disappoint! I knew how many things I was getting when I ordered it but WHEN IT GOT HERE IT WAS LIKE CHRISTMAS! Its like the stuff just kept coming out of the shipping box...it was so exciting!We have used both lenses and both have taken some amazing pictures! The product is nice with the exception of the tripod.THIS IS A MUST HAVE...YOU CANT BEAT THE PRICE!

Reviews.Title: Wow alot of stuff
Reviews.Author: Karri L. Adolfson
Reviews.Content: Had been looking around alot for a camera, Was between this one and the Nikon 3100.  Couldn't really pass up this deal and I 'm so glad that I got it.  Love the camera not too much of a learning curve.  But all the extras that come with this kit are really awesome.  Spare battery, tripod, cleaning kit, hdmi cord, bag, sd card, and reader, plus a dvd on how to use a digital slr. Great.

Reviews.Title: My new dslr camera
Reviews.Author: sharrie
Reviews.Content: Great but still learning waiting for a power converter so I can charge the battery as we are australia and the fitting is not right for us here, great camera will enjoy more soon.It came very fast and to my door, thankyou so much for the dslr camera

Reviews.Title: Nice starter kit!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this kit! The Canon Rebel T3 is a great starter DSLR camera! Worth the buy! The bag is not what I expected but I had to buy a bigger one anyways so I use this one as back up, this one is not the same that is shown in the picture, much more lightweight, would not be waterproof or protect from anything at all. Not much padding either. Other then that this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebol T3
Reviews.Author: D. Womack
Reviews.Content: I love this!  I am new to DSLR camera's I have a lot to learn but I am having fun figuring things out!

Reviews.Title: Bought this camer bundle through amazon
Reviews.Author: John from Alabama
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera bundle to anyone instered in taking pictures, I received it on time as promised and everything was with it as should be. I've taken numerous pictures since it arrived and it does a fantastic job. Highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: LoVe It!!
Reviews.Author: WeNaLuV
Reviews.Content: my husband and I loves this product and all it's accesories! I was eyeing on this from Dell.com and amazon.  Amazon won has it is less expensive than dell and it offers more accesories. Awesome buy and we've tried it and its great! CAnon is a good produce itself and getting it for the price is mind blowing! thanks Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Having a blast
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: What a great deal for the price.  Cannot believe I was able to nab so many extra goodies for just the price of the camera.  It was just too good to pass up.Enjoying my bday present to myself...my first "big girl camera".  Some of the settings are a bit confusing & there's tons to learn, but I have to say that i have taken some really amazing photos already & can't wait until school & sports start so I can capture all those special moments in a much better way than my Sony point & click digital camera. Loving it & know it'll last forever!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice user friendly camera
Reviews.Author: Tressa Bryson "Magaw"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for myself but when it showed up my husband decided it was for him.  Easy to use takes beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Killeenslc
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the picture quality I was able to get with this camera. I felt like this upgrade from a point and shoot camera was like when I went from a reguler cell phone to a smart phone. With my point and shoot camera I could zoom in on something, but not focus well. With the 75-300mm lens I loved how I could Zoom, and focus on the thing I was trying to get a picture of. One of my favorite pictures was at a zoo, there was a butterfly exitbit. I was able to zoom in on the butterfly, that was on some flowers, surrounded by other objects. I got the butterfly perfectly, and my other camera would not have been able to pick up the butterfly. I am still learning all the features of the camera, but I know I got my money's worth. I Love it and would never go back to the other cameras.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera!!
Reviews.Author: Fran8 "fran8"
Reviews.Content: I'm really quite new at SLR Digital Cameras, and am still experimenting with it.  So awesome!!  Did you know that Canon puts the size you'll need if you use a filter is in back of the lense cap?  Very convenient!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Marie Ebbesmeyer
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures.  The size is the only downfall since you can't just slip it in your purse or pocket...but that is what phones and ipods are for.

Reviews.Title: Cannon T3 Rebel thru Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Frederick T. Rutter
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything that was advertised.  I am very happy with the camera and all of the extras were a bonus. The vendor delivered as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased, camera arrived within 24 hours.  I know very little about DSLR cameras and have wanted one for quite some time.  Within a matter of minutes I was taking pictures of my granddaughter that were some of the best I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera Kit Review
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome and everything I hoped for. The kit came with so many things for such a great price.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: The very first pictures I took were action shots of my grandkids at a soccer tournament and a state swim meet. They turned out great and I was thrilled with the results. I can't wait to really learn all the ins and outs of this camera. I look forward to years of enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lena
Reviews.Content: I will admit that I have not done an extensive study on this cameras capabilities, but its been great for what we need it for.  It takes great shots, lots of settings for when you dont want to mess with the details, and the battery life is great.  Its light enough that I don't feel burdened carrying it around my neck, but it has enough heft to feel like its getting the job done.  I plan to do more that just snap shots with this camera, and I forsee that going very well.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: PoolBoy
Reviews.Content: We now can have high quality pics. No need to pay for professional photography any more. We can do it on our own time and at home or at parks. The kids sporting events is a plus. Also the wife is happy. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: photo fun
Reviews.Author: addison
Reviews.Content: This was a very good purchase as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It arrived rather quickly and was just as advertised. My daughter has enjoyed this immensely and I am pleased with the whole transaction.

Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Order was received timely.  Only negative was that one or two small items were shipped separately but no notice was provided that these items were missing from the original order. No problems thus far with camera and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Camera
Reviews.Author: Buzz Carocci
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera.  Can't speak for the actual workings of it as I purchased it as a gift but I do know that it works as specified and the person is real happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: Ashley P
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved this camera and all it came with! This was the best deal I found and couldn't pass it up!

Reviews.Title: Wife was surprised.
Reviews.Author: Robert from Oklahoma
Reviews.Content: Everthing was perfect!  Wife was so excited when opening all these gifts, (cause I wrapped then individually, lol) She is a little upset I will not let her take it on the cruise because last Canon was auto focus and ocean air messed up lens and needed replaced.  I am so pleased with the speed of delivery.  Great job to everyone involved.

Reviews.Title: My new camera-Cannon T3
Reviews.Author: jkleine
Reviews.Content: Amazing. Opened it on Christmas Day...no time to study how to use it. charged the battery, put on auto and proceeded to take the most amazing 127 pics that I have ever done. WOW! Now will watch the 1 hour DVD that came with this package and am betting I will really take some even more amazing pics.

Reviews.Title: Great Kit
Reviews.Author: JenPicGirl
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this Kit! Love the camera. Still learning about photography and the video included was very informational. Have used this camera before and had to have one myself. Would suggest this to anyone who loves to take pictures. Shipped very quickly and everything was in tip top shape.

Reviews.Title: Very good kit, very good price
Reviews.Author: A P
Reviews.Content: Got this for a friend, and he loves it. Very good price for the kit, and it pretty much includes everything you would need to take awesome pictures. The cleaning kit is a very basic one, nothing fancy here. The tripod is also of decent quality. It is extremely light weight, and it was very easy to setup the camera and adjust it. The movements with the tripod are little tight though and i think some lubrication has to be applied to smooth out the movements. 16Gb memory card is well suited to take RAW pictures. And the Canon zoom lens is very good as well. Overall a good value for money and very good service from ACE Digital as well.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: c.hoesly
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my Daughter because she will be going to an art institute starting in the fall semester. It is a really good starter set for anyone that is interested in phtography. She is very pleased with it and I would recommend it to anyone. You cant beat the price and the quality of the products you recieve is phenominal. Thank you Amazon and Ace Photo Digital. An excellent purchace for anyone....

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. My order came 2 days before a vacation trip. I've never been much of a photographer, but even without time to read up I was able to use it out of the box and take great pictures. Once I learn more than its usage on automatic settings, I'm sure I'll be even more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Canon T3 Camera Bundle
Reviews.Author: Michele Maddox-grott
Reviews.Content: Wanting to make sure I would get exactly what I needed, I took a photography class at the Sedona Arts Center and watched what others were using. My instructor, a professional photographer, has this camera and most of the accessories that came with this bundle. I also bought a remote and tulip. It arrived ahead of schedule as well. Love the camera!!

Reviews.Title: Rating my new camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine at first.  After a few uses the lens is foggy.  What can I do to correct it or is there a problem with the lens?  How can I return the lens and get a new one?  Please advise.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: perfect for the first time photographer
Reviews.Author: bigmamarnc
Reviews.Content: My son decided to play football his senior year after being out of the sport for 6 years.  Needless to say I wanted to document every second. So when I started researching cameras I started with my friend who had a Nikon with 75mm lens.  She told me the things to look for and what I needed and of course she rcommended her Nikon. But after looking at the two I am soooo glad I chose the Canon Rebel.  It is so easy to use and I have taken some amazing action shots.  I highly recommend this camera to anyone who isn't photo savvy it will not disappoint. And this package is a GREAT deal best I found.  I did go on and buy a bigger camera bag with more compartments but that was only for my convience not because there was anything wrong with the bag that comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3 camera kit
Reviews.Author: Patricia J. Spear "Spearpoint"
Reviews.Content: This camera kit comes with everything needed to take wonderful pictures from day one.  The 18-55mm lens takes great general pictures and the telephoto brings most objects close enough for great pictures.  The 16 GB card is large enough to take pictures for an entire vacation, or some short movies.  The included cables make it easy to download to your computer or use the memory stick.  It also comes with printed instruction manuals for beginning photographers as well as CDs.  I am very happy with the set.  I have used the Canon Rebel film camera for years, so changing to digital was fairly easy for me, but I found that the instruction manuals had some very good tips to help with the change.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level package!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting to learn photography since high school, way back in the 1970's...but the costs of equipment, film, developing, etc. Kept me from following through.  Now that the Digital Age has arrived, much of the learning costs have gone down.  You also get immediate results!  So, after shopping around various packages, I decided on this Canon EOS T3 Kit.The camera should be sufficient to teach me the basics of photography. If/when I master it, I can always purchase a new camera body, but this pckage should keep me busy for some time to come.My only concern in the entire package is the tripod.  It is a low-end model, not very fluid action and only one bubble level (I would prefer 2).  I would have gladly paid a little more to get a better quality tripod.Overall...if you're a newbie to photogrphy and don't want to front a huge amount of cash to learn, this is a pretty good package.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera package deal :)
Reviews.Author: Heather Stephens
Reviews.Content: Everything that's advertise came as pictured. The camera bag is alittle different but nice. This is a great deal! I look forward to warmer weather to take pictures outside. Fast shipping too. I ordered package deal a week before Christmas and it arrived at my door step within a few days.

Reviews.Title: Focus should do a better job
Reviews.Author: zero
Reviews.Content: The camera, lenses, cables, etc. are great. Really love the camera and the price was just the icing on the cake. Focus, however, did not do too good of a job with the accessories. The bag is not too great of quality (going with a canon bag would be worth it), and the tripod is simply unusable for me. Overall, I bought the bundle for the camera, lenses and extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP
Reviews.Author: Missdwinie
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for about three weeks now and I can't complain whatsoever.First of all, my package arrived 7 days before the scheduled delivery date via regular shipping which for me, is a major plus when it comes to customer service.I have been taking it everywhere I go. Pictures are of great quality even in low light settings and once you learn a thing or two about photography, you can pretty much figure out which setting to use for different scenes. I believe the package was well worth it especially because of the fact that there were two different lenses included along with a memory card, tripod etc...Considering the fact that I am a fashion blogger, I can say that this camera comes highly recommended because it takes great pictures of outfits with details portrayed very well. Battery life is another reason I am in love with my Canon. I do not have to charge it with every use and I find that absolutely amazing.So far, only pros. No cons at all for the time being.

Reviews.Title: This camera is amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Before buying I  read all the comments, positive and negative. As soon as I got the package I checked for all the accessories and I tried them all; they work perfectly!! and I think they`re good quality products and it comes with everything you need. If you are not truly advanced in photography this camera is just perfect for you!! I found out that most of the negative comments were because people do not know how to treat these cameras. Be gentle and PLEASE read the manual and the software instructions before using it.  BTW I`ve taken more than 300 pics in two weeks and they came out just beautiful. You only need to know how to use it and be creative!

Reviews.Title: Good package deal
Reviews.Author: E. Thomson
Reviews.Content: I am familiar with the Canon products and was looking to buy a digital SLR again. After some search, this package deal was pretty good. The accessories would be items I would have bought anyway. Overall, happy with it. The camera bag is the only item I will probably replace with something different, because it opens with just the two clasps and not a zipper, which makes me a little nervous. Otherwise, everything else okay. Fast shipping, good items, and a price within my budget.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Grace ohio
Reviews.Content: this item is great! I got it for my sister that loves to take picture and was looking into getting a professional camera and this was just great! it takes amazing pictures and it is very easy to use. thank you so much Great product :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent equipment
Reviews.Author: George Waller
Reviews.Content: Come in handy daily, I started as a hobby but I intend to make it an investment with future earnings.

Reviews.Title: Cannon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: Lori Mahuiki
Reviews.Content: This camera is beautiful.  My daughter is a senior in high school and needed it for her AP photo class.  her photos are amazing and is great for some one who is learning.  I feel that it was a fantastic price for all that you get.  I had read other reviews about the tripod being flimsy, and it is, but not as bad as I had read.  Very pleased :)

Reviews.Title: This is an amazing bundle
Reviews.Author: Mrs Understood "HK87"
Reviews.Content: You cannot beat the value of this bundle. We really are impressed. Now to read the manual and install the cd's so we can figure this booger out. :)

Reviews.Title: !!!!Grate Deal!!!!
Reviews.Author: edan crespo
Reviews.Content: I can't believe all the stuff u get for so little $$$ if u try to get it  separated u see the diferentes in price try looking for a deal like this els were  loved it wish amazon put more deals like this one

Reviews.Title: cannon eos rebel t3
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: i recieved this item on time and in good shape. everything was as advertised. the camaera works great and takes verygood pictures without much knowledge of using a digital camera. can't wait until I have more knowledge to see what i can do.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Sue MS Matson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera and its functions.  The photo quality is quite good and well suited for a novice to professional photographer.  However, I was disappointed that I don't have the option of editing photos in the camera on the go.  I am very much an "in the moment" photographer and prefer to crop and go, rather than sit for hours at my computer trying to capture the same image.  Still, this camera is fun to use and easy to work with.  And the price was very good.

Reviews.Title: Can EOS Rebel TE Camera
Reviews.Author: Softball Dad
Reviews.Content: I had owned a Canon EOS camera back when they used film and it was the best camera I had used.  I ordered this kit hoping it would be the same quality and it is even better.  The quality of the pictures are outstanding.  The auto focus lens take a little getting use to but using the manual setting for focus are just as easy.  The action multi frame get shots never possible before. I would suggest you buy the high speed memory cards if you plan on using the action setting it did work with the slower cards but it is much better with the higher quality memory cards.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a present
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace a similar camera stolen from my daughter's car. She loves it and that's all I care about.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: L. Cicchetti
Reviews.Content: Best deal around since you get all the extras, not just the camera. Lenses work great, one for close one for distance. Great deal.

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: My package arrived in about a week and was jam packed full of amazing stuff. Half of the stuff in my package I didn't even realize I was getting! I highly recommend this purchase to anyone like myself who needs a little of all the basics to get started on a new photography hobby or even a side business. I love my new Canon Rebel!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for entry level SLR cameras
Reviews.Author: mapeye
Reviews.Content: I am happy for the what I bought. I started a basic digital photographic course and its make me easy to understand everything, because it was the Profesor's base for all demostrations. That make me very confidence in what I bought.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: BIGRED
Reviews.Content: We looked for a good dslr camera for taking pictures of our kids in their sports. So far this camera has done a great. The zoom lens is like you are down on the field. We looked at several cameras, the price of the bundle package was the same or cheaper than buying the camera by itself. We had a small issue with the tripod when we received package. I called 47th street pic ( Anya was customer service) and had a new tripod on the way. Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Shruti Vangari
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my dad - he loves photography. it is the perfect gifting kit for all occasions and for someone who enjoys photography.

Reviews.Title: fantastic product
Reviews.Author: pawo
Reviews.Content: This set is great. The camera alone is worth the purchase price. The things that come along with it are a great addition. The zoom lens is a must have for football games and other sporting events.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Becky Jardine
Reviews.Content: I am photography student and had been wanting to buy my own camera for a while.  I had been looking for a while and finally had saved up enough money for the kit camera.  I was going to buy one from a big box store on sale and get the same camera and two lens, but not all the other "stuff" to go with it.  I was super excited to be able to spend the same amount of money and get all kinds of gear to go with my camera.  The camera is great and have been having a lot of fun learning all the features that the T3 has to offer.  I am, however, disappointed in the camera bag that came with this.  The clips that keep the bag closed and therefore protects the camera, broke in less then a week and I will now have to save up to buy a better bag.  They still close, sort of.  The tri-pod is also a little flimsy but for a "free" tri-pod I can't expect too much.I have told all my friends at school to check out this deal and am glad I finally got my own equipment. :D

Reviews.Title: Cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: weatherprofessor
Reviews.Content: The product is great.  The service from Abe's of Maine was lacking in that the camera arrived promptly, but the telephoto lens came two weeks later.  If it was back ordered, I should have been notified and how long it would take.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, also did a similar package
Reviews.Author: Golfing76
Reviews.Content: I have had the camera for a few weeks now, and loved the camera from the first picture. Takes very clear pictures and isn't hard to figure out. I had figured out most of the camera without reading the instructions. Love the video too, very clear and can zoom in and out very easily while taking video. Also the speed of the camera is what i love the most. I had another canon that i've had several years that was very slow, and i have 2 young kids, so i don't have 15 seconds to wait for the camera to get itself ready again. I like the multiple pictures at once feature but really haven't used it much yet. Nothing really negative to say about it at this point. Well worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: dcarnes
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased that I bought this camera package.  It has everything that you need to immediately start taking great pics.  We got the camera just in time to go on a vacation and took wonderful shots, the 16GB memory card offered plenty of storage and with the USB adapter it was easy to transfer the pics to the computer.  The only problem was the plastic connector for the strap on the bag broke within 10 minutes. But when we got home I called the seller and they shipped a new bag out right away.  This is a pricey camera, but it will last you for a long time and I think it is well worth it because the picture quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Perfect intro dslr kit
Reviews.Author: hellvet2000
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect bundle for the amateur enthusiast who wants to take professional looking pictures. It's perfect for everyday capturing. I added a 50mm f1.4 lens for more intense portraits, but the lenses that come with it are going to impress the beginner wanting a good intro to the dslr world and not wanting to spend $1200 on lenses alone! This price for what you get is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Lady T
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: I Love this camera I have had it for about a month & am still learning new things. & as i look around i got a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Be Warned, Do not buy product from this vendor "Focus"
Reviews.Author: Gerry  Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Actually my complaint is with the vendor and not the camera.This vendor is very uncooperative, and all they think about is keeping your money not that you are satisfied with their service, which is non existent. To top things off, after having to pay all the return shipping costs, they charged me for, what I can only guess , was a restocking fee. They never did explain what the charge was for, I sent the item back to them unopened still with their security tape intact.I regret ever having done business with this company. It was only because of Amazon's efforts to try and appease me with the little credits they gave me for my trouble, that I didn't pursue the matter any further than filing a dispute thru my bank regarding paying them their extra fee and demanding all of my money back not only a part of it. Live and learn I guess.... Gerry

Reviews.Title: Great bundle

Reviews.Content: BOUGHT CAMERA FOR MY GRAND DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS. SHE LOVES IT, TAKES GREAT PICTURES. WOULD RECCOMEND IT TO ANYONE LOOKING FOR A GREAT CAMERA

I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: great!!!

So far I haven't had a problem out of it and have loved using it.

Reviews.Content: I love it that's all I will say.  The only flaw is that when you look through the viewer your nose is against the camera.  Other than that I would trade it for the world.  Well maybe.

Reviews.Title: Awesome photos

Reviews.Content: I was scared that I would have to understand everything about photography, but this is a wonderful camera to just point and shoot!  Awesome quality photos and I love that I chose the zoom lens package also!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Cammy
Reviews.Content: This camera was a special birthday present to myself. I have enjoyed all of the wonderful features it offers and it arrived on time and in wonderful condition. I will be purchasing more accessories in the future. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Venezlatin78
Reviews.Author: Victor Benitez
Reviews.Content: I been looking for a camera for long time, but I didn't know what to get or from where,A friend told me about this camera and really like it.It have everything I was looking.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Bic
Reviews.Content: Do not tell me how many words I need to use in order to leave a rating.I Love It

Reviews.Title: MORE THAN I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Melvin Goodman
Reviews.Content: In 1980 or '82 I bought a Canon AE1 with 18-55mm and a 55- 270mm lens. It has been an excellent camera and it still takes fine pictures. However it's heavy, the flash attachment is no longer reliable and developing film is becoming a problem. Time to update. To me the only way to go was a new Canon SLR. Amazon had what I wanted and the price was right.I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box to find many more things in it than the camera. A tripod, an extra battery, as well as a camera bag were the top three.It is a more complex camera than the old one and while I am still learning how to use it (I guess that I'm use to a "phd" unit) I can see how much more this one can do as compared to the old one. I like the viewer and prefer using it over the screen. It takes some "getting used to" but I think it will well worth  the trouble of learning.

Reviews.Title: rebel t3 package

Reviews.Content: awsome simple  to use and nice pictiure taken good quailty for the price .if there is one the camera case was poor quality .

Reviews.Content: Nice 35mm camera, great price! Easy to work with lots of extras. Shipping was easy and fast, couldn't find a better price for camera with all the extras.

Reviews.Title: love this camera

Reviews.Content: I had been after an SLR for a few years now. Finally purchased a bundle and I'm very happy with it so far. I'm not well trained in photography so I tried to do some research. I really just wanted something I could take awesome pics of the kids in action & this camera doesn't disappoint. The extra lense that came in the bundle was well worth because you can play with zooming in at a distance.
